mapper.select: select MAIN_CATEGORY, count(1) from tbl_products group by main_category order by main_category
select sub_category from tbl_products where main_category = '${value}'
select product_code, count(1) from tbl_details group by product_code order by 2 desc
select o.option_name, o.option_price, o.option_code from tbl_products p join tbl_options o on p.product_code = o.product_code where p.product_code = ${productCode}
select product_name from tbl_products where product_code = ${productCode}
select avg(grade) from tbl_reviews where product_code=#{productCode} group by product_code
